text: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ لَا مَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ

translation.en: That is because Allah is the protector of those who have believed and because the disbelievers have no protector
translation.id: Yang demikian itu karena Allah pelindung bagi orang-orang yang beriman; sedang orang-orang kafir tidak ada pelindung bagi mereka
